hopobject.name: OBD-II BBB
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.71 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body: This project consists of using a chip based on the ELM327 command set for comunications between a car OBD-2 port and the BeagleBone Black.  The cape will communicate with the BeagleBone Black through UART and display the information in a way that is easlily manipulated.
hopobject.shortdesc: OBD-II reader for communications between car ECU and BeagleBone Black.
